OUT NOW! ğŸš€ The Purchaser #Issue19 Zachary PeÃ±a, Managing Partner at Empirix Partners, discusses the future of business consulting, the two-way road of trust, and building teams of talented individuals, regardless of their backgrounds. ğŸŒŸ A long and varied career path has led Zach to his role as Managing Partner at Empirix, yet now that heâ€™s there, it seems almost fated. Since leaving high school and joining the Marine Corps, Zach has travelled the world, gaining vital experience and people skills, developing the communication and trust needed to work with those across multiple industries and cultures. ğŸ¤ His story is this issue's lead article and feature interview and is well worth a read! ğŸ“– Link in comments ğŸ“Š â€œData is my battlefield of information. I learned very quickly that I need to grab it, understand it, influence it, and effectively communicate it to others.â€ Thanks to Ethan Summers, Sam Robinson, CDCP, PerpetualGrid, Regiment Securities #technology #data #procurement #supplychain #consultants #consulting

April 2024. RoviSys Celebrates 35! ğŸ† It's not just a milestone; it's a testament to dedication, innovation, and unwavering commitment. This month, as we celebrate 35 remarkable years, we can't help but reflect on the journey that brought us here. Many factors can be attributed to the rise of RoviSys in an industry which didn't materially exist when we opened our doors at Alpha Park in 1989. But perhaps the largest factor, which spans our entire history, is our laser focus on the client. Our ability and flexibility to solve customer problems and rapidly respond to their needs is why we exist and prosper. It's been the cornerstone of our success, guiding every decision, every innovation, and every stride forward. As we mark this milestone, we extend heartfelt gratitude to each and every employee who has contributed to the first 35 years. Your dedication, passion, and hard work have been the driving force behind our achievements. And to our #customers, thank you. Your trust, partnership, and support have been instrumental in our journey. We're honored to have been part of your success stories, and we look forward to continuing to serve you with excellence in the years to come. Together, we've built something extraordinary, and the journey ahead holds even more promise. The future looks bright, filled with new opportunities, challenges, and milestones waiting to be conquered. Here's to celebrating 35 years of excellence, and to many more ahead! ğŸš€ Company History â¡ https://lnkd.in/gtBNWyNu

At this half year mark, I want to give gratitude to my team for their perseverance to rise to the occasion with an unparalleled ownership mentality and a fierce dedication to prioritizing our customers. We have confronted a barrage of challenges head-on, transforming each challenge into an opportunity for innovation. Every member of this team is continually going above and beyond, fueled by a genuine passion for serving our customers, not as clients, but as cherished partners on this tumultuous journey. We embraced uncertainty, adapting with remarkable agility, and consistently pushed the boundaries of what's possible to meet and exceed our customers' needs. Our unwavering commitment was not just a duty, but a heartfelt mission to stand shoulder to shoulder with our customers, listening deeply to their difficulties, and proactively shaping solutions tailored to their evolving requirements. This commitment fortified our business and forged unbreakable bonds of trust with our customers. We are united around a common cause â€“ to champion our customers through the toughest of times, empowering them to triumph alongside us. With this fire in our hearts, let's push forward, uniting our efforts, and finishing this year stronger than ever before, making our mark in the pages of our shared success story. #DareToDisrupt #ActLikeOwners #CustomerFirst #EmbraceDifferent #LearnEveryDay #SEGreatPeople Asim Farooq, Cristi Lington, Jim Braxton, Mike Tjemmes, Randy Friesenhahn, Pat Prunty

Itâ€™s been a wild ride ever since, but a very fulfilling one. Our goal was to provide enterprise level IT services for the small and mid-sized businesses who didnâ€™t even understand what properly functioning IT looked like. In doing so, they get to run efficiently and be more productive to achieve their goals. That was our goal in 2014. That is still our goal in 2024. Thatâ€™s what we do. The past decade has been one of teaching, learning, trying, failing, and immense character growth. Weâ€™ve had some sweet highs and bitter lows. In it all we are thankful to God for guiding us, challenging us, and providing for us. Without him, none of this would exist. Weâ€™re beyond grateful for all of our customers, whose trust in us has been a cornerstone of support in what we do. Thank you for being part of our journey. Weâ€™ve vicariously celebrated every win youâ€™ve had, because helping you succeed is the most fulfilling aspect of our work. Knowing that weâ€™ve played a role to support you in getting there is a reward like no other. So thank you again, from the bottom of our hearts. Here's to the relationships we've built, the challenges we've overcome, and the successes we've celebrated together. Your success is our success, and we look forward to continuing this journey with you. Thank you for 10 remarkable years. Here's to many more years of innovation, growth, and shared success! -Arthur and George #Anniversary #10YearsStrong #Thankful #CustomerSuccess #EmpowerBiz #BusinessTechnologyReImagined

ğŸ‰ Celebrating 14Years of Business Excellence and Growth! ğŸŠ Lucky number 14 has brought us another reason to celebrate - it's our 14th year in business! ğŸ¥³ A Journey Beyond Imagination: Over the past 14 years, our business has blossomed from a mere dream into a thriving reality. The journey has been nothing short of incredible, filled with ups, downs, and endless opportunities for growth. Building Success Brick by Brick: Our success story has been built on a strong foundation of hard work, dedication, and unwavering commitment to our vision. We've faced challenges head-on, learned from every experience, and emerged stronger each time. A Team That Defines Excellence: Behind every successful venture is an exceptional team. I want to express my deepest gratitude to our amazing team members, past and present, who have contributed their time, talents, and passion to make our business what it is today. Gratitude to Our Loyal Customers: We wouldn't be here without our loyal customers who have supported us on this journey. Your trust, feedback, and partnership have been invaluable, and we're excited to continue serving you. Looking Forward to the Future: As we celebrate this milestone, we're not just looking back on our achievements; we're also eagerly looking forward to the future. With the same spirit of innovation, dedication, and a commitment to excellence, we're ready to embrace the next 14 years and beyond. Cheers to 14 Years and Counting: Here's to the next chapter of our journey - one filled with new opportunities, greater achievements, and even more remarkable milestones. We couldn't be more excited about what lies ahead. Thank you to everyone who has been a part of our journey. Your support, dedication, and trust are the driving forces behind our continued success. Here's to celebrating 14 years of business excellence, and to many more years of growth, prosperity, and making dreams come true! ğŸš€ğŸ‚ğŸ¥‚ #14YearsInBusiness #MilestoneCelebration #BusinessExcellence
